Convert quarterly growth to annualized growth

Source: R/fcst_utils.R
pc_to_pca.Rd

Convert quarterly growth to annualized growth

Usage

pc_to_pca(ser_in)

Arguments

ser_in

series containing quarterly growth (in percent)

Value

the series containing annualized growth (in percent)

Examples

`ncen@us.sola` <- ts(NA_real_, start = 2016, end = 2021, freq = 1) |> tsbox::ts_xts()
`ncen@us.sola`["2016/2021"] <- c(323127513, 325511184, 327891911, 330268840, 332639102, 334998398)
test1 <- AtoQ(`ncen@us.sola`)
#> Joining with `by = join_by(time)`
tsbox::ts_c(test1 |> tsbox::ts_pc() |> pc_to_pca(), test1 |> tsbox::ts_pca())
#>            pc_to_pca(tsbox::ts_pc(test1)) tsbox::ts_pca(test1)
#> 2016-01-01                             NA                   NA
#> 2016-04-01                      0.7417883            0.7417883
#> 2016-07-01                      0.7404152            0.7404152
#> 2016-10-01                      0.7390472            0.7390472
#> 2017-01-01                      0.7390547            0.7390547
#> 2017-04-01                      0.7354119            0.7354119
#> 2017-07-01                      0.7340623            0.7340623
#> 2017-10-01                      0.7327177            0.7327177
#> 2018-01-01                      0.7331329            0.7331329
#> 2018-04-01                      0.7288721            0.7288721
#> 2018-07-01                      0.7275464            0.7275464
#> 2018-10-01                      0.7262255            0.7262255
#> 2019-01-01                      0.7279676            0.7279676
#> 2019-04-01                      0.7215575            0.7215575
#> 2019-07-01                      0.7202582            0.7202582
#> 2019-10-01                      0.7189636            0.7189636
#> 2020-01-01                      0.7226676            0.7226676
#> 2020-04-01                      0.7130563            0.7130563
#> 2020-07-01                      0.7117874            0.7117874
#> 2020-10-01                      0.7105231            0.7105231
#> 2021-01-01                      0.7092632            0.7092632
#> 2021-04-01                      0.7080078            0.7080078
#> 2021-07-01                      0.7067568            0.7067568
#> 2021-10-01                      0.7055103            0.7055103
